title: Allergy Natural Treatment with Herbal Remedies
cleaned_text:
People across the world suffer from different types of diseases, which are caused due to allergy. They may get asthma, pollen grain allergy, hay fever, allergic rhinitis etc. But the oldest medication form, Ayurveda is a key to get away from these allergies. Ayurvedic herbal medicines help to retain the balance in the body and enhance the immune system.

It is said in Ayurveda that if there is any disorder in the levels of vata, kapha and pitta dosha, then it gives rise to diseases. Vata allergy occurs due to excess dryness. Pitta allergy occurs due to inflamed sinuses. Kapha allergy occurs due to congestion. Allergies mainly occur due to the imbalances in the pitta and vata doshas.
